resources.string: The &appname; Project is a project created to inform my friend\'s when i published a new blogpost on &channel_url;
Thank you Jesus that you died for me on the cross and rose again.
For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life. John 3:16
Thank you sea for your help in developing the app.
Thank you timmy for the design of the turtle logo.
&appname;-App can also be started manually to check the RSS-Feed from the website &channel_url;. For this, only the button on the start page must be pressed.
My blog is located at www.marcusradisch.de.
